title: Internal Control Manager Job at R & R Recruiting Services
content:
R & R Recruiting Services is a Recruitment Agency, Training, Consulting & Human Resources Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Control Manager 

Job Location: Egbeda, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Microfinance Bank (Unit)

Responsibilities


	Implement and monitor internal control systems
	Conduct internal audits
	Ensure compliance with policies and procedures
	Identify control gaps and prevent fraud
	Submit audit reports to management


Requirements
     

            
    




	BSc / HND in Accounting or related field
	Minimum of 5 years of banking experience
	ICAN/ACCA is an added advantage


Benefits


	Salary: N500,000 - N550,000 / Month. 
	13th month salary
	Annual leave
	Other staff benefits.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cv to: r2recruitmentservices@gmail.com using the Job Position as subject of the email.

Note: For enquiries, contact the recruiter via WhatsApp 09035411252.

Job Position: Assistant Graphic Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ode-Remo, Sagamu - Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Automobile Manufacturing
Reports To: Graphic Designer Officer

Job Summary


	The Assistant Graphic Designer will support the design and marketing team in producing high-quality visual content used for branding, advertising, product promotion, and internal communication within the automobile manufacturing company.
	The role involves assisting with creative designs, product visuals, digital content creation, and ensuring brand consistency across all platforms.


Key Responsibilities
Creative Support:


	Assist in developing visual concepts and designs for flyers, brochures, banners, presentations, and other marketing materials.
	Support senior designers in creating product catalogs, brand assets, and automobile model illustrations.


Digital Content &amp; Social Media Design:


	Design basic graphics for social media posts, display ads, website content, and promotional campaigns.
	Edit photos and prepare digital assets for online use.


Product &amp; Automotive Design Assistance:


	Assist in creating product mock-ups, technical illustrations, and renderings for new and existing automobile models.
	Work with the Technical Design and R&amp;D teams to prepare visual materials for marketing presentations.


Branding &amp; Identity Support:


	Ensure designs follow the company&rsquo;s brand guidelines and maintain uniformity across all materials.
	Prepare templates for internal communications, reports, uniforms, signage, and packaging.


Printing &amp; Production Assistance:


	Prepare print-ready files and assist in liaising with print vendors.
	Support quality checks of printed materials and ensure accurate color and finish.


Administrative &amp; Team Collaboration:


	Organize design files, archives, and digital storage.
	Provide general design support during exhibitions, corporate events, product launches, and trade fairs.
	Work closely with the marketing, production, and sales teams on ongoing design needs.

Educational Qualifications:


	OND in a related discipline
	Design certifications (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, CorelDRAW, Motion Graphics) are an added advantage.

	A portfolio demonstrating design skills is required.

	Basic to intermediate proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDRAW, and InDesign.

	Strong photo editing and layout skills.

	Strong attention to detail and consistency.
	Good communication and teamwork abilities.

Assistant Graphic Designer Job at Proforce Limited




        
    

        
        Proforce is a total defence solution provider in West Africa. As Nigeria’s first and only indigenous defence manufacturing company, Proforce is ISO 9001:2015 Certified and specializes in offering defence solutions that ensure personal protection across all terrains; in the sea, the air and on the land.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Graphic Designer

Job Location: Ode-Remo, Sagamu - Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Automobile Manufacturing
Reports To: Graphic Designer Officer

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Assistant Graphic Designer will support the design and marketing team in producing high-quality visual content used for branding, advertising, product promotion, and internal communication within the automobile manufacturing company.
	The role involves assisting with creative designs, product visuals, digital content creation, and ensuring brand consistency across all platforms.


Key Responsibilities
Creative Support:


	Assist in developing visual concepts and designs for flyers, brochures, banners, presentations, and other marketing materials.
	Support senior designers in creating product catalogs, brand assets, and automobile model illustrations.


Digital Content & Social Media Design:


	Design basic graphics for social media posts, display ads, website content, and promotional campaigns.
	Edit photos and prepare digital assets for online use.


Product & Automotive Design Assistance:


	Assist in creating product mock-ups, technical illustrations, and renderings for new and existing automobile models.
	Work with the Technical Design and R&D teams to prepare visual materials for marketing presentations.


Branding & Identity Support:


	Ensure designs follow the company’s brand guidelines and maintain uniformity across all materials.
	Prepare templates for internal communications, reports, uniforms, signage, and packaging.


Printing & Production Assistance:


	Prepare print-ready files and assist in liaising with print vendors.
	Support quality checks of printed materials and ensure accurate color and finish.


Administrative & Team Collaboration:


	Organize design files, archives, and digital storage.
	Provide general design support during exhibitions, corporate events, product launches, and trade fairs.
	Work closely with the marketing, production, and sales teams on ongoing design needs.


Job Requirements
Educational Qualifications:


	OND in a related discipline
	Design certifications (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, CorelDRAW, Motion Graphics) are an added advantage.


Experience:


	1–3 years of experience in graphic design, preferably in an automobile, engineering, or manufacturing company.
	A portfolio demonstrating design skills is required.


Technical Skills:


	Basic to intermediate proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDRAW, and InDesign.
	Knowledge of video editing tools (Premiere Pro/After Effects) is an advantage.
	Ability to create simple product mock-ups and visual renderings.
	Strong photo editing and layout skills.


Soft Skills:


	Creativity and willingness to learn.
	Good time management and ability to work under supervision.
	Strong attention to detail and consistency.
	Good communication and teamwork abilities.


Salary
N80,000 - N150,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, portfolio or samples of previous work and Cover Letter highlighting relevant years of training experience to: hrm@proforcedefence.com using “Application for Assistant Graphic Designer – Automobile Manufacturing” as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Industry: Microfinance Bank (Unit)

	Identify and manage operational and credit risks

	BSc / HND in Banking, Finance, or related field

	Salary: N450,000 - N500,000 / Month.
	13th month salary
	Annual leave
	Other staff benefits.
